com.onenetwork.backchain.client

Interface DisputeBackchainClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EthereumDisputeBackchainClient

    public interface DisputeBackchainClient
    Interface for interacting with the DisputeBackchain. Acquire an instance via BackchainClientFactory.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeDispute(java.lang.String disputeID)
      Close the Dispute with matching disputeID.
      java.util.List<Dispute> filterDisputes(Dispute.DisputeFilter disputeFilter)
      Returns all Disputes matching the given filter.
      Dispute getDispute(java.lang.String disputeID)
      Disputes are stored in the DisputeBackchain.
      int getDisputeCount(Dispute.DisputeFilter disputeFilter)
      Returns the number of Disputes matching the given filter.
      int getDisputeSubmissionWindowInMinutes()
      Get the Dispute submission window.
      java.lang.String getOrchestrator()
      Returns the address of the entity acting as the Orchestrator for the DisputeBackchain.
      void setDisputeSubmissionWindowInMinutes(int timeInMinutes)
      Set the Dispute submission window.Disputes may only be filed within this amount of time from the point the transaction in question's block was added to the blockchain.
      void submitDispute(Dispute dispute)
      Submit a new Dispute to the DisputeBackchain.

    • Method Detail

      • submitDispute

        void submitDispute(Dispute dispute)
        Submit a new Dispute to the DisputeBackchain.
        Parameters:
        dispute - a new Dispute

      • closeDispute

        void closeDispute(java.lang.String disputeID)
        Close the Dispute with matching disputeID.

        WARNING - only the disputingParty on a Dispute can Close it.

        Parameters:
        disputeID - ID of Dispute to be closed

      • getDispute

        Dispute getDispute(java.lang.String disputeID)
        Disputes are stored in the DisputeBackchain. This method returns the Dispute stored matching with the disputeID.
        Parameters:
        disputeID - of the desired Dispute
        Returns:
        Dispute

      • getOrchestrator

        java.lang.String getOrchestrator()
        Returns the address of the entity acting as the Orchestrator for the DisputeBackchain.
        Returns:
        address of the entity acting as the Orchestrator for the DisputeBackchain

      • getDisputeSubmissionWindowInMinutes

        int getDisputeSubmissionWindowInMinutes()
        Get the Dispute submission window. Disputes may only be filed within this amount of time from the point the transaction in question's block was added to the blockchain.
        Returns:
        Dispute submission window, in minutes

      • setDisputeSubmissionWindowInMinutes

        void setDisputeSubmissionWindowInMinutes(int timeInMinutes)
        Set the Dispute submission window.Disputes may only be filed within this amount of time from the point the transaction in question's block was added to the blockchain.

        WARNING - only the Orchestrator is permitted to change the dispute submission window

        Parameters:
        timeInMinutes - new time in minutes for submission window

      • filterDisputes

        java.util.List<Dispute> filterDisputes(Dispute.DisputeFilter disputeFilter)
        Returns all Disputes matching the given filter.
        Parameters:
        disputeFilter - filter criteria
        Returns:
        matching Disputes

      • getDisputeCount

        int getDisputeCount(Dispute.DisputeFilter disputeFilter)
        Returns the number of Disputes matching the given filter.
        Parameters:
        disputeFilter - filter criteria
        Returns:
        number of matching Disputess
